getUserAgent

public static java.lang.String getUserAgent(android.content.Context context)
Produces a User-Agent string.

Example: 

 VenmoTouch/0.0.1 dev (Android 4.1.1/16; Asus; Nexus 7; unknown; com.venmo.example.vtdemo1 1.0/1)

Components:

  • Venmo Touch name and version ("VenmoTouch/0.0.1")
  • Venmo Touch SDK release type ("release" or "dev")
  • Android OS version and API Level ("Android 4.1.1/16")

    Parameters:
    context -
